resources.string: List of Songs displayed as List View.Tap on each item to play the song !
Displays the list of Albums as a card view inflated in recycler View.Tap on each item to know more.
List of songs sorted by artist in recycler view.Tap each item to know more.
Displays songs as sorted by Playlist in recycler view.Tap to know more details.
Click here to pay for your favorite song and buy it!!!
Once the payment is Confirmed using your token values the song will be added to the song listview
Album Information for the artist name clicked on the list view Item.Click to know the songs available for the artist.
Displays the list view of all the songs available for the clicked album on the list view!
